transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ha Mangesh ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Mangesh ji main Prasanna Enterprises ke regarding mujhe baat karni thi. Main Taruna baat kar rahi hun IndiaMART head office se.
Executive: Ha.
Executive: Aapka ek sir aapne ek inquiry kara tha uske regarding aapki baat hui hogi aapke account manager Srishti ji se. To aapka ek ticket open hua tha sir aapne not satisfied usme mark kiya tha. Abhi aapka recently aapne IndiaMART join kiya hai na?
Customer: Ha recently.
Executive: Sir recently join kiya hai sir usme aapka not satisfied aapne mark kiya kya issue aa gaya matlab kya abhi services aapki start hui hai.
Customer: [inaudible] order nahi aa rahe.
Executive: Sir to abhi services aapka start hua hai. Dheere dheere wo sari cheeze usme aa jayega. Order mein kya nahi aa raha hai matlab order to aapko aa rahe hai aap buylead to consume kar rahe ho lead mein kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ha. Nahi nahi wo wo kya fayda hi nahi na uska 100 200 ka.
Executive: Sir abhi aapne services abhi 10 din pehle hi start kiya aap 10 din mein services judge mat kijiye na.
Customer: Mera bolne ka matlab samjhiye sir. Jis din hume lagega acha hai to us din karenge hum.
Executive: Ha kyunki sir dekho aapka not satisfied aaya tha. Kuch issue hai lead mein koi dikkat aa rahi hai to batao main usko theek karwati hun. Bulk order chahiye ya aapka lead chota aa raha hai. Aapko aap keh rahe ho bulk order to sir aap waha pe Mangesh ji jab sun lijiye sir aap jab bulk order aapko aap jab filter option use karte hain bulk order ke liye?
Customer: Check karte na usme nahi dikhta.
Executive: Filter mein aapko bulk order kam dikhta hai. Pehle dikha shuru andar hai to. Theek hai baad mein baat karte hain.
Executive: Sir to ek kaam kijiye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' after joining IndiaMART.

- Customer is not getting enough orders.

- Customer says buyleads are not useful.



Resolution:

- Executive explained services just started, will improve.

- Executive offered to fix lead issues.

- Executive asked if customer uses filter option.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, buyleads, not satisfied, filter option
